country.name: India
country.description: India is known for its diverse culture, history, and large population. In sports, it has strong performances in cricket, field hockey, and badminton.

country.name: Republic of Moldova
country.description: Moldova is recognized for its emerging sports talent, particularly in wrestling and judo. The country is developing its presence in the international sports arena.

country.name: Kosovo
country.description: Kosovo is known for its emerging sports programs and has achieved success in judo and weightlifting. The country is developing its presence in the international sports arena.

country.name: Cyprus
country.description: Cyprus is known for its beautiful landscapes and historical sites. It has emerging talent in sports like athletics and swimming.

country.name: Fiji
country.description: Fiji is renowned for its strong tradition in rugby and beautiful natural landscapes. The country also has emerging athletes in sports like athletics and swimming.

country.name: Jordan
country.description: Jordan is known for its rich cultural heritage and emerging sports programs. It has competitive performances in sports like athletics and boxing.

country.name: Mongolia
country.description: Mongolia is renowned for its strong tradition in wrestling and its vast landscapes. It has notable achievements in sports like judo and archery.

country.name: Panama
country.description: Panama is known for its vibrant culture and strong performances in sports like athletics and boxing. The country also has a growing presence in other sports.

country.name: Tajikistan
country.description: Tajikistan is recognized for its rich cultural heritage and emerging sports talent. It has competitive performances in sports like athletics and wrestling.

country.name: Albania
country.description: Albania is known for its rich history and cultural heritage. The country has emerging talent in sports such as weightlifting and athletics.
